metadata.description: a16z portfolio companies relevant to developers building software

companies.name: Cursor
companies.oneLiner: AI-powered code editor that helps developers write, refactor, and debug code using natural language
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier with 2,000 code completions/month and 50 slow premium model requests
companies.useCase: AI-assisted code editing, refactoring, and debugging

companies.name: Replit
companies.oneLiner: Cloud-based IDE and deployment platform with AI agent that builds full apps from natural language prompts
companies.freeTierDetails: Free Starter tier with limited dev time, compute, storage, and basic AI access
companies.useCase: Browser-based coding, AI app generation, instant deployment

companies.name: Replicate
companies.oneLiner: API platform to run open-source AI models (image, video, audio, text) with zero ML setup
companies.freeTierDetails: Free credits on signup; pay-per-prediction pricing after
companies.useCase: Run open-source AI models via API without managing infrastructure

companies.name: Fal.ai
companies.oneLiner: Ultra-fast serverless inference platform for generative AI models (images, video, audio) with sub-second latency
companies.freeTierDetails: Free credits on signup; pay-per-use pricing starting at $0.005/megapixel
companies.useCase: Fast AI inference API for image/video/audio generation in production apps

companies.name: Groq
companies.oneLiner: Lightning-fast LLM inference powered by custom LPU chips, offering the fastest API for language models
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier with limited rate limits for basic testing; Developer tier with 10x limits at 25% discount
companies.useCase: Fastest LLM inference API for building AI-powered applications

companies.name: ElevenLabs
companies.oneLiner: AI voice synthesis and cloning platform with APIs for text-to-speech, voice cloning, and audio generation
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier with limited characters per month for text-to-speech
companies.useCase: Add realistic AI voices, text-to-speech, and voice cloning to apps

companies.name: Mistral AI
companies.oneLiner: Open-weight and commercial frontier language models with developer-friendly API for building AI applications
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier API access with rate limits; open-weight models available for self-hosting
companies.useCase: LLM API and open-weight models for building AI features and agents

companies.name: Clerk
companies.oneLiner: Drop-in authentication and user management for React/Next.js apps with pre-built UI components
companies.freeTierDetails: Free for up to 10,000 monthly active users
companies.useCase: Add authentication, user management, and session handling to web apps

companies.name: PlanetScale
companies.oneLiner: Serverless MySQL-compatible database platform built on Vitess with branching, non-blocking schema changes, and horizontal sharding
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier was removed in April 2024; paid plans start at $39/month
companies.useCase: Scalable MySQL database with Git-like branching for schema changes

companies.name: Sourcegraph
companies.oneLiner: Universal code search and AI coding assistant (Cody) for navigating and understanding large codebases
companies.freeTierDetails: Cody Free was discontinued in July 2025; replaced by Amp (new AI coding tool)
companies.useCase: Code search across repositories and AI-powered code understanding

companies.name: Hex
companies.oneLiner: Collaborative data science notebooks combining SQL, Python, R, and no-code workflows with interactive data apps
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier for individual use with limited compute and sharing
companies.useCase: Build and share data analyses, dashboards, and interactive data apps

companies.name: Stainless
companies.oneLiner: Automated SDK generation platform that creates type-safe, polished client libraries from your API in minutes
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier available for open-source projects
companies.useCase: Auto-generate and maintain SDKs in TypeScript, Python, Go, Java, and more from your API spec

companies.name: Arcjet
companies.oneLiner: Developer security SDK for Next.js, Node.js, and Bun with bot detection, rate limiting, and attack protection
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier available for small projects
companies.useCase: Add bot protection, rate limiting, email validation, and security to JS/TS apps

companies.name: Databricks
companies.oneLiner: Unified data analytics and AI platform combining data warehousing, ETL, ML, and governance in one lakehouse
companies.freeTierDetails: Free Community Edition for learning and experimentation
companies.useCase: Unified platform for data engineering, analytics, and machine learning

companies.name: Stripe
companies.oneLiner: Payment infrastructure for the internet with APIs for accepting payments, managing subscriptions, and financial operations
companies.freeTierDetails: No monthly fees; pay-per-transaction pricing (2.9% + 30 cents per successful charge)
companies.useCase: Accept payments, manage subscriptions, handle payouts, and build financial products

companies.name: GitHub
companies.oneLiner: World's largest code hosting platform with version control, CI/CD, project management, and AI-powered Copilot
companies.a16zFund: a16z Main Fund (exited via Microsoft acquisition)
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier with unlimited public/private repos, 2,000 CI/CD minutes, and Copilot Free
companies.useCase: Host code, collaborate on projects, automate workflows, and use AI-powered code suggestions

companies.name: Figma
companies.oneLiner: Collaborative design and prototyping platform for UI/UX design with real-time multiplayer editing
companies.freeTierDetails: Free Starter plan with up to 3 Figma and 3 FigJam files
companies.useCase: Design user interfaces, create prototypes, and collaborate with design teams

companies.name: Rork
companies.oneLiner: AI-powered mobile app builder that turns natural language prompts into full React Native apps for iOS and Android in minutes
companies.freeTierDetails: Free to start building apps; paid plans for advanced features
companies.useCase: Generate complete React Native mobile apps from text descriptions with instant preview via Expo

companies.name: Runware
companies.oneLiner: One API for all AI: unified inference platform for image, video, and audio generation with 400K+ models and sub-second latency
companies.freeTierDetails: Free trial credits on signup; cost-per-image pricing model
companies.useCase: Integrate AI image/video/audio generation into apps via a single unified API

companies.name: Flora AI
companies.oneLiner: AI-powered infinite canvas creative tool for designers - Cursor for creatives with text, image, and video AI models
companies.freeTierDetails: Free plan with limited projects and generated content; Pro starts at $16/month
companies.useCase: AI-powered creative workflows combining text, image, and video generation on one canvas

companies.name: Hedra
companies.oneLiner: AI video generation platform for creating lifelike character-driven videos with realistic lip sync and expressions from images and audio
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier with 300 credits, no credit card required; API requires paid subscription
companies.useCase: Generate character-driven AI videos with lip sync and facial animation via web app or API

companies.name: k-ID
companies.oneLiner: Child safety compliance platform that helps developers automatically comply with kids' privacy and safety regulations across 200+ global markets
companies.freeTierDetails: Enterprise/B2B pricing; contact for details
companies.useCase: Automate child safety compliance for games and apps across global jurisdictions

companies.name: Nexxa AI
companies.oneLiner: Agentic AI platform for industrial engineering that automates critical engineering workflows in heavy industries
companies.freeTierDetails: Enterprise B2B pricing; contact for details
companies.useCase: AI agents that integrate with legacy systems to automate engineering processes in heavy industry

companies.name: Fundamental Research Labs
companies.oneLiner: Applied AI research company building autonomous collaborative AI agents, including Fairies (general AI assistant) and Shortcut (spreadsheet agent)
companies.freeTierDetails: Consumer-facing tools available; pricing varies by product
companies.useCase: Autonomous AI agents for complex workflows - from Minecraft NPCs to financial modeling

companies.name: PagerDuty
companies.oneLiner: Incident management and on-call alerting platform for DevOps teams to respond to production incidents
companies.freeTierDetails: Free tier for up to 5 users with basic incident management
companies.useCase: On-call alerting, incident response, and operations management for production systems

ai-coding.label: AI Coding Tools
ai-coding.description: AI-powered code editors, IDEs, and app builders

ai-infrastructure.label: AI Infrastructure
ai-infrastructure.description: Model hosting, inference APIs, and AI development platforms

ai-creative.label: AI Creative Tools
ai-creative.description: AI-powered design, video, and content creation tools

ai-agents.label: AI Agents
ai-agents.description: Autonomous AI agents for various domains

data.label: Data & Analytics
data.description: Data platforms, notebooks, and analytics tools

developer-tools.label: Developer Tools
developer-tools.description: Code hosting, SDK generation, and development utilities
